title: Hana-san wa Minorasetai!
original_name: ハナさんは実らせたい!
sinopse:
Hana meets a good-looking guy at the train station, then happens to meet him again on a blind date. However, despite his indifferent attitude, Hana discovers that he just might be the person she's been talking to online for the past four years!

(Source: MU)
